document.full_text: britain said on friday it would ban the export to the united states of three drugs used to carry out lethal injections and called on other european union countries to follow suit.
document.title: britain to ban export to u.s. of execution drugs
lines_and_colors: britain said on friday it would ban the export to the united states of three drugs used to carry out lethal injections and called on other european union countries to follow suit.
